description:
PasteDeploy 1.5.0 was released in May 2011 and has only seen a handful of bugfix commits on its development branch since then

  https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PasteDeploy
  https://bitbucket.org/ianb/pastedeploy/commits

Cinder requires >=1.5.0 while neither glance nor keystone require a specific version.

We've no reason to expect that a future version of PasteDeploy will break us, so let's unpin.
title: Unpin PasteDeploy dependency version

comments.content:
PasteDeploy 1.5.0 was released in May 2011 and has only seen a handful of bugfix commits on its development branch since then

  https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PasteDeploy
  https://bitbucket.org/ianb/pastedeploy/commits

Cinder requires >=1.5.0 while neither glance nor keystone require a specific version.

We've no reason to expect that a future version of PasteDeploy will break us, so let's unpin.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/22975
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/22975
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/5cc05e28785a2be4a7bea89e1c73939e9c76facd
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5cc05e28785a2be4a7bea89e1c73939e9c76facd
Author: Mark McLoughlin <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 26 12:12:40 2013 +0000

    Unpin PasteDeploy dependency version
    
    Fixes bug #1133262
    
    There are no newer releases of PasteDeploy than 1.5.0 and we have no
    reason to believe newer versions will break us. Indeed, if an
    incompatible version is released, we will want to know about it quickly.
    
    Change-Id: I331b33b16ea50202886b19bf5c4060d9fa46d5ec
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
